name: DBHub (Universal Database Gateway)
description: Provides a universal database gateway for connecting to PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and DuckDB, enabling table...

metadata.readme_excerpt:
> [!NOTE] > Brought to you by [Bytebase](https://www.bytebase.com/), open-source database DevSecOps platform.

![Star History Chart](https://api.star-history.com/svg?repos=bytebase/dbhub&type=Date)

DBHub is a Universal Database MCP Server implementing the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server interface. This gateway allows MCP-compatible clients to connect to and explore different databases. ```bash +------------------+ +--------------+ +------------------+ | | | | | | | | | | | | | Claude Desktop +--->+ +--->+ PostgreSQL | | | | | | | | Claude Code +--->+ +--->+ SQL Server | | | | | | | | Cursor +--->+ DBHub +--->+ SQLite | | | |
